title: So as of this patch, how does one play Elise?
body:
I'm assuming you would build runeglaive but that's all I know. I don't know what runes one would take, what masteries, what skill order, what clear route, or what else to build. 

I played her a lot back in Season 3 and a bit in early Season 4. I really liked her but then she got every bone in her body broken by the nerf hammer and fell down to the worst win rate in the game for a bit. Currently her win rate is still relatively low but she seems playable now since she got some changes. 

Anyone have any tips/guidelines for playing Elise?

Edit: 

I feel like she scales off of magic pen more than straight up AP, sorta like Teemo in a way. But unlike Teemo I feel like she is more of an AP bruiser. 

I posted this build below when replying to a comment, tell me what you think!
